website_summaries.verdict: The JBL Endurance Sprint is a surprisingly good wireless sports headphone for $50, with only a few small downsides.
pros: The JBL Endurance Sprint fits securely and comfortably and sounds very good for a modestly priced Bluetooth sports headphone
It's also fully waterproof and has touch controls
cons: Touch controls can be a little finicky and there's some presence boost in the treble

customer_reviews.title: VOLUME CONTROL DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: VOLUME CONTROL IS STUPID AND IMPOSSIBLE TO USE WITHOUT PAUSING, FORWARDING, OR TURNING OFF THE MUSIC.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Freedoom

customer_reviews.title: Super bass and isolation
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bass! Didn't have to turn the volume up far at all since the noise isolation works so well. Could probably use these as ear plugs... touch controls are a tad finicky. When I let the right bud lie against my chest, the touch controls turned it off. However if you keep them in your ears no problem. I've found it easiest to adjust volume dramatically, using the entire pad of my finger all the way from under the bud and dragging all the way up to where it starts to curve. After getting the hang of it these are quite nice. If you have sensitive ear canals beware, putting these in is extra suction-cuppy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable in the market
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best wireless set in the market. I bought them for my days out in my Jetski and they are phenomenal. They don’t fall off and they are very comfortable in your ears. They sound canceling feature helps you to enjoy the music clearly. They also last a long time with the charge. Overall a great product with a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Lazaro Ferro

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and sound, controls will take some getting used to
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these fit in my ears. Compared to my Beats Powerbeats that I was constantly adjusting, these go in and stay in. In fact, they seal so well that you don’t notice other sounds around you, something to keep in mind if used outside running or riding a bike. The sound is pretty good with nice bass and clear mids. The controls take a little getting used to, but I think over time they’ll become more natural. Everything is controlled my tapping or swiping the right headphone.
customer_reviews.author: Matt228

customer_reviews.title: Don't change the song?!?
customer_reviews.text: My phone is in a LifeProof case so Bluetooth headphones are a must. These are very secure in your ear, have good sound (I listen mostly to podcasts), and good battery life - BUT if you touch the control bar it will FFw through your playlist the "control" panel is impossible to use, if I have one ear in and the control side touches my shirt it changes songs, volume, or shuts off. It is a great earbud if you put it in your ear and DO NOT touch it. I wear my hair up and have to wonder if even hair touching it would make it change songs etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones except for control button(s)
customer_reviews.text: Work as advertised with one major flaw. The on/off start/pause area is extremely sensitive and super annoying. While working out, if I brush the side of the earphone with my hand or sweat towel, it pauses/skips, etc. Worst feature ever. Not sure if they tested this product before releasing. I probably pause or skip my music at least twice a workout. Definitely gets 2 stars off for that. Other than that, they are pretty good headphones. Sound is good, but average sound cancelling. Overall build quality seems good (other than major button flaw). No carrying case, but that's not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: marcntx

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in March and knew I should have returned them straight away. The volume and sound quality were both garbage. They did pair nicely with my iPhone and fit well and stayed in place during workouts, however, so I decided to keep them since I only paid $40.00 for them. Well, unfortunately, 3 months after I purchased them, they will not charge. Like I said, garbage......
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, bad touch controls
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and battery life are not noticeably different from more expensive headphones. Fit is good, and they stay on throughout my runs. They fit so snugly that you don't hear much ambient noise, so watch out for cars you can't hear! The touch controls are terrible. The pause and on/off touches are very sensitive. I often turn them off inadvertently when I'm just trying to dry my forehead with a towel. The touch volume control is completely useless. Overall, still probably a better value than Beats or other products at 4x the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Finger (Amazon)

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, secure, great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones for the gym. They are light, unobtrusive, and stay puts, no matter what am I doing. Excellent Bluetooth range; I place my phone in the middle of the large fitness room, and have clear reception anywhere in the facility as I jump from station to station. The sound quality is excellent, especially considering the low cost! The volume control is a little tricky at first, but works well once you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: I’m not a give 5 stars for everything guy.
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the greatest thing since sliced bread so that why it didn’t get 5 stars. Having said that, I really like these headphones! For the price these are outstanding. I had to change out the ear bulb things to get the correct fit. Once I did they sound really good. Good highs, mids, and bass. These aren’t AirPods, but at 1/3 of the cost these are well worth it! I bought these for the gym and they do a good job of canceling out the bros dropping weights to get noticed. It’s a 115lb deadlift and your slamming the weights? C’mon man! Anyway these are a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Solid headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of headphones but the button on the side, which is also the power button, and the button that allows you to pause and replay music is on a heir trigger. For example I turned the headphones off and kept them around my neck and the button on the right earphone, just from rubbing against my shirt turned on and repaired to my phone. You just have to be careful when using. Other than g that they are great! Good sound quality etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Best fitting earphones I've ever owned, the way it "screws" into your ear is much better than I anticipated, amazingly effective. Better sound than I would've thought for the price as well. The controls for music/volume are a little weird in comparison to other headphones, but responsive and effective nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Hilbern

customer_reviews.title: Overall great headphones, only a minor flaw.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned these headphones for about two months now. They are waterproof, I have taken showers with them in. The only problem is that the touch power/skip button is very sensitive and when the shower water hits it it will shut off or skip a song. They cancel out noise very well. They come with big and small ear buds. Good bass and clear sound. Would recommend them to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: A Swing and a Miss
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good and secure...best I've use. Sound is good, not great. Controls are mystifyingly stupid, but at least syncing with devices quick and consistent. The worst part is the very annoying short cord between earphones. If it was just one inch longer it would be better. Hard to believe JBL could design something so poorly. Over priced for overall product design and experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid workout headphones
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them to work out once so I can't comment on the longevity but....great set of workout headphones. They fit snugly and don't slip as I run/lift weights. The audio quality is comparable to what I was getting with the Beats3. In fact, I like the way the earpiece fits my ear better. I did a few work calls after the workout and the call audio could be a little louder (minor detail.) These for $50 vs the Beats3 for $199 is a no brainer. Good work JBL!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: these are very solid
customer_reviews.text: i read all the major wireless earbuds reviews before buying these, and chose these because I believed they had the best performance for the price. I noticed that no single earbud had very high ratings. I can tell you that for $40 or any price in that vicinity, these are great. They fit in my ears just fine, they don't come out. I use them to workout with. The sound quality is good and very decent bass tones. They seem pretty durable, but I've only had them for a month or so. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Ben Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These are so awesome. I'm in love. I'm super picky when it comes to the perfect balance and noise cancelation, and these fill the order perfectly! There's ample bass, and theyre not watery or fuzzy sounding at all! I was super suspicious of the cable connecting them at first, but these are the most comfortable Bluetooth earbuds ive ever had. They won't fall out noatter what! I got the used ones for $27. A knock out deal. I'm in love!
customer_reviews.author: Dan or Jeriee Green

customer_reviews.title: Good budget waterproof headphones
customer_reviews.text: If you want reliable bluetooth connectivity (20 ft in a crowded gym), long lasting battery life (6+ hours), waterproof/resistant (i sweat pretty hard when working out), and good sound quality, these are for you. I can comfortably run with these on. The touch input is very sensitive and takes some getting used to. I have had some accidental inputs at times, but overall it's not the end of the world or frustrating enough to warrant a bad rating.
customer_reviews.author: tanknadz

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: JBL’s Endurance Sprint wireless headphones in my opinion are awesome. They fit nicely in your ear, are super comfortable, and don’t dislodge or fall out mid workout. As far as sound it’s great. Nice bass, clean sound, and they completely block out outside noises. Haven’t tried they in water or exposed them to much rain but I’m fully confident they’ll be just fine. I’d recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Poor controls but decent sound quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these about one month ago and use them when jogging, rowing, and lifting and they stay in the ear very well. The sound quality is fair (serviceable enough for my purposes, anyway) but I think any audiophile would do well with something a bit more robust. The touch controls are horrendous, though, as others have commented and very sensitive; even when I have them completely turned off, they randomly come on around my neck or even in the drawer where I keep them.
customer_reviews.author: Sean M. Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Sound drops out of one side
customer_reviews.text: I had these earbuds for less than a month before the sound would drop out of the left earbud. I use them for podcast/book listening around the house- but mostly for running. Pretty annoying when you are 8 miles into a 12 mile run and you can no longer hear your book because the sound drops out. Too late to return to Amazon. $50 waste. Either get super cheap ones and replace every 2-3 months, or get some $100 and have them for a year. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Lovemybooks

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these because of the quality of the JBL Bluetooth portable speakers. I have to say that I was not as impressed with these. They function great. The touch controls are a little touchy but work nicely. When I received a call while on a run the individual said that they heard me just fine. My one complaint about these is that the sound quality isn't what I wanted. They have a tinny sound. I prefer more bass and mid-range to my music. There is no way to adjust the sound attributes. The battery life has been good. I got a full 8 hours of play on a charge. Overall these are a solid set of headphones.
customer_reviews.author: crkane007

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good sound, stopped working after 4mo
customer_reviews.text: If I had written this review yesterday it would've gotten a 4 or 5. The sound quality is good, the headphones are light, and they stay in my ears well (which is NOT common for me). Many others have complained about the touch being too sensitive or confusing, but it didn't bother me too much, I usually have my phone nearby when I workout so I often use that to adjust the sound or song. However, 4 months after purchasing the sound has stopped working in the right ear. Huge bummer, and inconveniently outside of the return and support window, so I guess that's $50 I'll never get back.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Sound & Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am completely blown away with how amazing the sound quality and clarity is ..... these sound significantly better than others I have purchased for $150 - $250 in the past. Super impressed with JBL right now ....... especially for this price point. If you are looking for great sound at a great price you might as well go ahead and click purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Shepard

customer_reviews.title: With the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks now and so far it’s been great. The function button on the ear piece is a bit too sensitive but I’m getting use to it. Sound quality is good and for the price I paid compared to similar wireless ear phones, this item is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: lyle john

customer_reviews.title: The best fitting workout headphones I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: The for is fantastic. Other headphones would fall out of myears depending on what position I was in while doing a certain exercise. These are the most secure fit headphones I've ever used. You will not be disappointed. The sound is very good not great. The volume could be a little bit louder on some songs. Overall I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: They are light, unobtrusive, comfortable, sound equally good as any Beats wireless, and charge quickly. What more do you want for workouts and runs...
customer_reviews.author: Sjs

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas in 2018. In September 2019, the left earbud went out to the point where nearly no sound came from it. I called JBL and spoke with someone who said I could submit a warranty claim. However, I bought it here on Amazon through a 3rd party vendor that was not supported through JBL. Therefore, they wouldn’t honor the warranty. Also, the buttons on the headphones are not user friendly. If they are in a bag or something, they can easily turn on on it’s own. Don’t buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eric H.

customer_reviews.title: Sunk by sweat
customer_reviews.text: Really like the sound quality, stability of headphones in the ear, and the near perfect length of the cord but overall these head phones are made useless by the touch system to control audio. Works fine at the start of a workout but as it progresses the controls become more and more haphazard. When the workout gets intense and sweaty and i need some extra loud biebs to take it to the next level.....forget about it. Trying to up the volume is as likely to power down as to pause the song or advance it. Seemingly anything except the desired action could happen. If they had just gone with buttons this would be a 5 star review
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great for taking walks and working out.
customer_reviews.text: Great compact light buds. Controls are odd to learn at first but intuitive one you figure them out.
customer_reviews.author: John Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality sports headphones
customer_reviews.text: My Power Beats wireless 2 headphones were stolen and I did not want to buy another pair of headphones that were expensive. The JBL headphones are very comparable to the Power Beats and in my opinion are better because they are $150 cheaper and they are louder. The ear silicone molds are bigger which blocks out more noise. Also, JBL headphones are more balanced than the Power Beats because the music control and mic are not on the cord. The only Con I have is that the touch controls on the JBL headphones are a little finicky and I would recommend just using your phone to change the volume and songs. Save yourself the money and BUY JBL.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Beware of issues.
customer_reviews.text: As others have noted, the controls are stupid and annoying. The sound quality is good, but unfortunately the pair I purchased lasted only three months, then died. Suddenly started giving static and feedback between the phones. Per Amazon I contacted the seller, but they said their guarantee was for only two months. Handy for them. They told me to contact JBL, which I’m sure would be useless. I’ll be trying another brand, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Cotton

customer_reviews.title: Basic waterproof headphones, not for heavy rain or water use.
customer_reviews.text: They are good earphones, though the controls are extremely sensitive and can be affected by any touch. The energy saving feature to turn off when not being used is extremely short, sometimes being turned off after just a couple of minutes. Even though they have some degree of waterproof they are not fully waterproof and can get affected by it. If purchasing, better to go for the JBL Endurance Dive. The Powerhook is awesome, but a little uncomfortable for long term use. The microphone sucks, people can barely hear you when using them.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro Camilo Velasco

customer_reviews.title: One ear died after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: These seemed really good at first but after about 2 months the right ear basically died (it has about 1/10 of normal volume so I can't actually listen to anything coherently) and there seems to be no warranty beyond the 30 Amazon return.
customer_reviews.author: Fr Matthew P. Schneider, LC

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are great. Sound is of quality. A cool thing about these, you just have to tap the right earbud to change songs, slide finger up on the right earbud to increase volume. Only issue I have is the ear pieces are a little big. Need more smaller ones for smaller ear holes.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Unnecessarily difficult. I’m returning.
customer_reviews.text: You’ll spend a while trying to figure out how to lock these things in your ears. I also noticed that the sound was really low. The controls were also really sensitive once I finally got them in my ears. Way too much trouble. I’m returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mad

customer_reviews.title: Ok for gym
customer_reviews.text: Touch controls are super sensitive. Battery life needs improving. Good for wear at gym. I'm usually a fan of jbl but these not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet Knight

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 16 year old son for Christmas, he absolutely loves them. Said that they were a little uncomfortable for the first day or two but after that they were great fitting and they sound amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Tried this pair after looking for a pair of good headphones that don't sacrifice sound quality for comfort. The verdict is out after a couple of weeks of use. This pair is not comfy and does not have a good sound quality. I listened to many hours of Spotify streams and this product performance is at best bismal. I also have to push it in my ears every 10 to 20 minutes as it gets loose and tries to pop out. I reckon if my ears are sweaty from any activity it is going to be worst.
customer_reviews.author: Reza Motamedi

customer_reviews.title: Functional, cool and works
customer_reviews.text: Wanted headphones that get out of my way, had a band so I won't lose it and good battery life. This meets those needs and it is cool to wear. Getting comfortable with the controls is a learning curve. I only bothered to learn the volume up/down, power on/off and pairing. I've heard issues with proper placement of the earpiece for better phone conversation. Sometimes I have to move it around for the other party to hear me. Overall, I use it mostly for music so not a bother. I'd recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price. A few quirks.
customer_reviews.text: I like these but. I find them hard to turn on and off and adjust the volume. I also on the flip side find them ultra sensitive once turned on to stop and pause the music etc. if I was to buy another pair I think I’d research a bit more. I find them hard to insert to my ears also.
customer_reviews.author: EmmaM

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend two changes: First, change the touch sensor to a button. It gets quite annoying when every slight touch of a towel or my shoulder pauses the music. Secondly, change the tone when it turns on and off to a voice. However, these things sound great and they stay in place!
customer_reviews.author: M. Roach

customer_reviews.title: Touchy sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: The touch sensitivity on the backs of the buds is really touchy. I turned them and and had them around my neck and they turned on and started playing. But in all I think they a great headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonlady

customer_reviews.title: stays in your ear more than needed!
customer_reviews.text: The extra magnets aren't even really a required earphone piece but these stick in there so well they're never falling out while running! even more force keeping it listening and the blue tooth volume, song skip forward and back is great help. i love the head phones, easy to pair, works great premium music is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Never worked!! I got them to turn in once & then suddenly they quit working. They wouldn’t hold a charge. They also sounded horrible. Barely fit in my ear. I wasn’t able to return bc I didn’t try to use them until after my return window time was over. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Good for music
customer_reviews.text: These are great for listening to music while working out at the price point. But the controls are too sensitive. During voice calls it is hard for the other person to hear me when the right plug is in ear.
customer_reviews.author: Sonm Pawar

customer_reviews.title: Good connection poor controls
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the earbuds fit in the air. But the controls on the side are very sensitive. And very hard to control the features. You can’t even accidentally brushed against our touch the side of the earpiece without the music either pausing fast forwarding or lowering the sound.
customer_reviews.author: snacks

customer_reviews.title: Spend more to get something of better quality
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well initially. I liked the comfort and construction. However, In under two months the sound has diminished to a point where I can barely hear anything at full volume.
customer_reviews.author: Frannie

customer_reviews.title: Fails to pair with blue tooth
customer_reviews.text: Bought these headphones a few months ago but just started using at the gym. They worked for a couple hours of weeks and now will not pair with the machines at the gym nor my iPhone. I am extremely disappointed with this headphone. I did my research and thought I was buying a quality product. I’m going to purchase a wired replacement and it won’t be a JBL product!
customer_reviews.author: David Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Controls are impossible to work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbuds for workouts. All the controls are touch activated on the right ear piece, which is too small to accommodate them. One touch to pause, two touches to change songs and then slide your finger up/down to change volume. Changing the volume NEVER worked. It only resulted in pausing my music and if I ever adjusted my earbuds during my workout I ended up either pausing or fast forwarding the music. Way too much trouble. Sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B. Terry

customer_reviews.title: Super sensitive stop button.
customer_reviews.text: The pause fast forward and stop button is way to sensitive especially when you wear a hoodie and the sweat from your head hits it causing the music(or whatever) to stop or skip forward.
customer_reviews.author: erick v

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I really didn’t like that you had to tap for volume because I never got them to work like the directions described. I also felt the cord was too short. Overall not a good fit so I returned them.

customer_reviews.title: Jury Still Out on These
customer_reviews.text: First two workouts, these worked fine (except for crazy controls...ugh). Third workout, they started skipping. It was like the fast-forward button was being hit. Turned everything off/on and re-paired bluetooth. Still would happen after about a minute of use. Grabbed another pair of bluetooth buds that I have and they worked fine. I'll give the JBLs one more shot. If this skipping continues, I'll be forced to return.
customer_reviews.author: Jerilin P. Kenney

customer_reviews.title: The best I've used
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and stay put while running. I have tried over a dozen different styles and brands for my workouts and these have been the best I've used. Only minor complaint is the sound, I little too bright.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JBL at its finest
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand about some of the bad reviews the touch control is perfect and the sound is immaculate you can’t get much better for the price
customer_reviews.author: Broadway

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Prime Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my BEST purchase of the year BAR NONE...I cannot find enough words to compliment these earphones, price, quality, ease of use, arrived quickly, quality packing...I use them at the gym everytime I go...you will not find a better product for twice the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: spikeola33

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertise but touch volume is tough to figure out, just use the phone buttons for volume
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I can’t quite master touch volume though. May be blocks too much noise. You can literally hear your heartbeat with these on and nearly no peripheral noise.
customer_reviews.author: ahkim2000

customer_reviews.title: Very poor design.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very poorly designed. If the right earbud touches anything or if you try to adjust the earbud in your ear, it forwards what you're listening to or pauses it. They are absolutely worthless. All the controls are on the outside of the right earbud and it is impossible not to inadvertently touch it, causing all sorts of problems. Also, the connecting cable is much too short so the earbuds pull on your ears. I am returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Miller

customer_reviews.title: Touch Control and Texture were turn down for me
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the texture of the product, sound quality was good for the price. The touch control was very buggy! I didn't like that and won't be referring it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep

customer_reviews.title: Sound is fine. Stays in ears well. Control button really hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: The on/off and song advance/pause button is super-temperamental. It is very hard to use while running and, sometimes, does its own thing e.g. if my hat barely taps it the wrong way. If it weren't for these annoying features I would give it 5 stars. Sound is not perfect but is very good for the price. It does stay in my ears while running better than most other headsets.
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Bass could be just a touch better, but good clear crisp sound quality. Battery lasts as long as I do, haven’t had it due on me yet during the day so that’s a plus. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joe f.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing even for the price
customer_reviews.text: When I go running, they don't stay on well in spite of the ear hooks. They don't always turn off/on smoothly and sometimes they start buzzing very loudly and have to be reset. Because of the tap controls they are hard to adjust without causing them to pause or skip. They also don't provide very good ambient sound. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Right price , good earphones , acceptable sound quality to say the most
customer_reviews.text: Is what you get for the price range , overall I’m satisfied , expected a better sound quality but its ok.
customer_reviews.author: fernando vizcaino

customer_reviews.title: Ok. A little bit much for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good product. I dislike the how the buttons are too plush on the headphone. It makes it difficult to turn on/off, control volume, change music etc...
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: If you don’t lift your arms they are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the size and price, as long as you dont bump them. Any time I raise my arms above my head I bump the control and chit them off.
customer_reviews.author: AZ

customer_reviews.title: Battery Doesn't Stay Charged
customer_reviews.text: Had to return new ones because they wouldn't turn on consistently. I couldn't get them to power on after 6 hours of charging on day 2. They seemed like they would stay in while running. The sound was fairly good, but definitely missing the bass. As mentioned by many, the touch controls are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sounds great
customer_reviews.text: Item sounds great, but difficult for use of controlling functions, such as when skipping a song or turning off or adjusting volume. Aside from that, no issues and I run about 25-35 miles a week using these on roadways and parks.
customer_reviews.author: cmezoom11

customer_reviews.title: Bald headed sweat doesn't harm
customer_reviews.text: Nice ear buds. I can not wear the ones that just sit in your ears. I have always just used actual headphones. These fit comfortably and work well. As a plus I don't have to worry about sweat ruining them.
customer_reviews.author: Waylon

customer_reviews.title: comfort and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good and because it fits snug in the ear, no background noise. But because it fits snug in the ear, ear gets sore. Also battery life is not so great. The touch control is super sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: ramon

customer_reviews.title: Good overall headphones... Ideal for the gym (if you have short hair)
customer_reviews.text: Trust me, don't buy this headphones if you have long hair... why? The touch controls en the right ear are so sensitive that the slightest touch (even with your hair) will pause or skip the track... Besides that, good sound quality, good battery life and waterproof... I use mine every day since I bought them and I'm very happy...
customer_reviews.author: Maximo Perez

customer_reviews.title: My new gym headphones
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly securely fits and stays in ear. Feels and looks waterproof. Great for physical activities like the gym. Can be a tad sensitive on the controls but still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Wear in pool. Won't work under water, but great for water aerobics. On off a bit touchy but fantastic product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: connection is good. I didnt like the fit of the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is decent, connection is good. I didnt like the fit of the product and the cord is too short, it keeps pulling the ear peice a little when u turn your head. I used it for running and had to adjust it multiple times to acheive a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mandana

customer_reviews.title: Infuriatingly horrible controls
customer_reviews.text: Controls are horrible. When it's powered on, the control button is suuuper touchy and will pause at the slightest touch. When it's off however, it's extremely difficult to get it to register the touch to turn on. Very distracting while working out, I'm returning this. Positive reviews must be from people who don't use them while moving..
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with these headphones, the charge last for a while and it doesn't become uncomfortable after wearing for a while.
customer_reviews.author: R Nauth

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift in perfect condition they absolutely loved it. Great for people who love to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Grecia

customer_reviews.title: excellent product at a great value
customer_reviews.text: My first foray into wireless earphones. I primarily bought them for use on a Peloton bike and so far they have been exactly what I was looking for. Excellent sound, solid connectivity, secure and comfortable fit. Great value too; I'd stack them up against my coworker's Beats any day.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McAlvey

customer_reviews.title: With some learning they are great!
customer_reviews.text: I found these very secure and the sound quality is good the only thing I have trouble with is the touch controls and the way they lock in your ears but I still use them almost everyday
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: Quality but could use a couple improvements.
customer_reviews.text: JBL quality is there but lacks bass and the touch functions on the right earbud are super sensitive and I always end up pausing the music each time I adjust the ear bud. They are also a little bit larger than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: She liiikes them
customer_reviews.text: Per my 30yr old daughter, the recipient of this gift: "Comfortable and easy to wear with quality sound"
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones stay in my ears while running, which no other headphone has been able to do. They're comfortable, and the sound is great. They come with 3 different size gel ear-pieces. With the medium ones on, they tended to bounce around a little in my ears, but I switched to the smallest size and that did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Ira R.

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection
customer_reviews.text: Crappy sound quality, poor fit, volume control doesn't work. Low quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Hupp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are really “bomb proof” and durable. If you are looking for a light weight minimal ear bud these arent for you. Great fit and noise cancellation by the twist and lock ear pieces. Use them for the gym daily wear and tear. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Riley&GizmosDad

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound but still uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sound is great honestly and the touch controls are easy to use but I can't get much use out of them since they're very uncomfortable to put in and still uncomfortable to wear when I'm trying to work out. I ended up opting for a neckband earbud set.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sound, crappy control scheme.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound. However the controls suck. I have a very hard time turning up the volume without skipping a track, or disconnecting. They turn on and off whenever handled because of the control method.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Flowerette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound great value
customer_reviews.text: The sound is very good, the price even better, we have Bose and apple air, I like these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is great
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life and easy to connect. Not had issues with sweat or water. Really happy with this device.
customer_reviews.author: fl sergio Montoya

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: For less than 100 bucks you can't complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Bad sound
customer_reviews.text: Desde que lo tuve se escucho un sonido raro en el auricular derecho como si la bocina estuviera reventada o como interferencia. Since the beginning there's some weird noise on the right auriculuar, it sound like the speaker was broken or something like that kind of interference on the sound.
customer_reviews.author: missael gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work for swimming as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Turned off the moment I got in the pool to swim.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless ear devices
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and in appropriate package. paired with iPhone and Apple Music, and now on long distance biking New Age music the ride is easily managed.
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Mccandless

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don’t sweat a lot, not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: It started off really nice I don’t think it’s as water proof as they say it is. I sweat a lot during my workouts. Now after 10 minutes of exercise they start to skip and be staticy during songs and the only way to make them stop is to either turn them off or pause it for about 2 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tech for the price. It locks on your ears, sounds great and I can shower with it. reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up from the audio professional
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! This is the second pair I’ve bought, one for me and one for my girlfriend. It’s not gonna reproduce below 40-50 hz but for podcast listening and mix referencing they are super nice. I actually can listen to music on them and not hate having headphones and not my studio speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Wooten

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly.
customer_reviews.text: Controls are not easy to use. Trying to do volume control on headphones is not easy. Not really a user friendly workout headphone.
customer_reviews.author: keith kraemer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, but cannot use in water
customer_reviews.text: These have great sound, but the touch controls on the right earbud are so sensitive that you can't really use them in the water. Otherwise, they are really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Buy these already!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones keep up with day to day activities. They do an amazing job of noise isolation. From the single 10mm driver this boasts amazing bass and treble. They are lightweight and don’t hurt your ears with 3 different size rubber sleeves that give the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I like these
customer_reviews.text: Touch functions work well once you get used to them
customer_reviews.author: steve keatng

customer_reviews.title: Not great for working out
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit well in or over my ears, was learning to deal with it. Ultimately for a workout headphones they just didn't work for me, once you started to work up a sweat the cord would stick to the back of your neck and was constantly pulling one direction or the other
customer_reviews.author: Les Crane

customer_reviews.title: Tinny/high treble but functional
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't expect too much soundwise and they are tinny even on treble light songs, but they do stay in as promised. I wish the sound quality was a bit better as I had better quality sound on the cheaper and discontinued Heiyo G18s, but these are functional and they do stay in your ears.
customer_reviews.author: C

product_meta.title: JBL Endurance Sprint Waterproof Wireless in-Ear Sport Headphones with Touch Controls (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackYou will receive 1 JBL endurance Sprint - Sport wireless in ear HCL (Black) in ear, waterproof, Bluetooth headphone with play/Pause touch control
feature_bullets: Bluetooth wireless allows you to stream high quality music without the worry of messy wires interfering with your workout
Secure fit ear hook design provides ultimate stability during workout. When not in use The magnetic hook provides a convenient storage solution for your headphones
Thanks to twistable and flex soft technologies, these headphones are lightweight and ergonomically built to ensure comfort and stability no matter the workout
Featuring IPX7, the JBL endurance Sprint are designed to be used in all weather conditions. Durable and made to last, No matter the elements
Touch controls allow you to easily manage your music and calls controlling volume, play and pause and track your order with a simple touch for extra convenience, so that you can keep going

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars473 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
